name: get_characters
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool optitalk.
Tool description: Create custom highly advanced general AI chatbots and characters with distinct personalities, and knowledgebase. Engage with a vast library of user-generated characters.

http://optitalk.net/

## Key Features
- **Personalized chatbots and characters**: Craft unique and engaging characters with distinct personalities, backstories, and interests to bring your stories, games, or applications to life.
- **Explore user-generated characters**: Access a vast library of user-created chatbots and char...
API description: Get a list of publicly available characters as well as the characters that you created.

## Character Usage
Once you've retrieved a character, you can copy its ID and use it in the /chat endpoint in order to chat with it.

page_size.description: Number of characters to retrieve per page. Defaults to 25.

page.description: Page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

private.description: If True, return only the characters created by the user. If False, return all publicly available characters. If None, both types of characters are returned. Defaults to None.
